name: Toaster Ship 2D
description:
Toaster Ship 2D is a remake of my first ever game made in the Godot Game Engine called Toast Explorer!

With Easy controls, Stunningish Pixel art, Lots of power ups, and a simple objective.

Get the Highest Score, and Get the Longest Time!

With bread spawning faster each second, it will be challenging to survive for so long!

Optimized especially for Mobile, gameplay and performance on your mobile device will be increased to the maximum!

it's a fun and addictive game to play on your mobile device, and you can play it with NO INTERNET, anywhere, anytime!

thank you for downloading and have fun!

(comment any bugs and errors so i can fix them)
